subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: After testing positive for a banned substance in June 2005, Guillermo Cañas was suspended from the ATP Tour.  Protesting his innocence, he returned last fall with a renewed purpose.
snippet: After testing positive for a banned substance in June 2005, Guillermo Cañas was suspended from the ATP Tour.  Protesting his innocence, he returned last fall with a renewed purpose.
